TextBlock.Text: AVENS: Why are we placing these gravity crystals down here?
OENO: If we want to be able to watch the fish without having to float on the surface, we need to be able to stick to the floor.
PRIVET: Don't forget to wear your spacesuit! We can only observe the local wildlife if we can breathe!

AVENS: Alarmingly, I seem to be drifting somewhat. This must be a result of the buoyancy of the water attempting to drag me up. Stay attentive, friends! If you find yourself drifting away and cannot swim, just hold onto a tree until the water passes!
OENO: The crystals on the tree are merely so that we can get a nice view of the stars.
